revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/p-53-d2-plug.aspx |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = GlobalScale |model = D2Plug |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = plug computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YCJ003-XXXXXXX |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88AP510;(ARMADA 500) Dove; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v7 |cpu1_type_rev = (PJ4 core) |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 / 1000 MHz --> |gpu1chip1 = Vivante;GC600; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G2FEJA-A001; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L3205DM2I-12G; |flash2size = 4 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83BFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = F0:AD:4E |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell version: 5.4.4 NQ; |stockos = Linux;3.7.10;;
|exp_if_types = eSATA,USB 2.0, SD Card slot, HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.25 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P
|serial = yes,, console,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, J15
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, VGA out, SD Card slot, Audio out (3.5 mm), Audio in (3.5mm), SPDIF, RTC w/ battery, Bluetooth 3.0, eSATA |addchip = Audio DAC chip;Realtek;ALC5630;;1;,,, Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, Low Spurious Multiclock Generator for Audio;Asahi Kasei;AK8128;;1;,,, EEPROM Programmable Clock Generator;IDT;IDT5V49EE503;;1;,,, Configurable Multiple-Function Gate;Diodes Inc;74LVC1G97;;1;,,, MicroPower <!--Supervisory--> Circuit w/ Manual Reset;Analogic Tech;AAT3528;;1;,,, 1uA <!--Quiescent--> Current 150mA LDO Regulator;Eutech Micro;EUP7180;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semi;uP0109;;1;,,, 12V 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;4;,,, Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1;,,, Dual USB 2.0 Integrated ESD Protection;NXP;IP4223;;7; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = ubuntu |defaultpass = marvell |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- 003-D2P001 --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = (US Edition) |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/19/2011 |estreldate = 06/2011 |estprice = 249 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AzureWave AW-AH397 |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8797; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @800MHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0, OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 8GB eMMC, 4MB Serial Flash, SD Card, eSATA port *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn + Bluetooth 3.0 *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Host) ports, :1x USB Micro-B Device port *Power: 100-240V AC
==Links of Interest== *[https://liliputing.com/globalscale-d2plug-is-a-handheld-sized-arm-based-desktop-pc-for-249/ ''Globalscale D2Plug is a handheld-sized, ARM-based desktop PC'' on '''Liliputing'''] *[https://linuxdevices.org/linux-android-mini-pc-debuts-hd-ready-marvell-pxa510-soc/ ''Linux/Android mini-PC debuts HD-ready Marvell PXA510 SoC'' on '''LinuxDevices'''] *[https://www.linuxfordevices.com/news/globalscale-technologies-d2plug-and-marvell-pxa510 ''Globalscale Technologies D2Plug and Marvell PXA510'' on '''Linux for Devices'''] *[https://www.engadget.com/2011-05-16-globalscale-d2-plug-offers-hd-video-3d-graphics-in-little-linux.html ''Globalscale D2 Plug offers HD video, 3D graphics'' on '''Engadget''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:GlobalScale D2Plug Top.jpeg|Board Top File:GlobalScale D2Plug Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:GlobalScale D2Plug SD Board Top.jpeg|SD Board Top File:GlobalScale D2Plug SD Board Bottom.jpeg|SD Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
